sub_title: (Supplier) Quality Director. Motivated, experienced, good humoured, analytical mindset. Auditor, people leader, Aerospace, medical, food-contact, high volume consumer goods
summary:
PROFILE
Director with 20+ years of experience in global (supplier) quality and development: with my entrepreneurial mindset and customer focus, I strive to lead global teams of professionals in the best possible way. I strive for consensus but am also able to vigorously defend my position, using facts as a basis.

As a Quality Director, I am continuously captivated by the assortment of challenges that come my way. From refining quality systems and processes to resolving product or process issues, managing intricate legal and compliance requirements, and addressing interpersonal or stakeholder perception concerns.

During my career I have assumed responsibilities for products ranging from Aerospace components to mass consumer goods, food contact products and medical products across a wide spectrum of technologies and suppliers. 
My experience in working with people of diverse cultures and varied expertise and levels is extensive and I enjoy it. 
Always motivated and good-humoured by nature. I embrace a leadership style that prioritizes influence over coercion, coaching over dictating, and adaptability through active listening.

EXPERTISE
• AS9100, ISO9001, 13485, 14001
• Lead Auditor ISO 9001, 13485, 14001 & process audits
• LEAN six-sigma Leadership (Toyota method)
• Good Manufacturing Practises (GMP)
• Good Documentation Practises (GDP)
• Supplier Sustainability & Sustainability Auditing
• Global and Highly Diverse People Leadership

SKILLS
• Quality Management
• Process Quality
• Auditing
• Supplier Development
• Project Management
• Continuous improvement

COMPETENCIES
• Motivated
• Emphatic leader
• Fair & Supportive
• Analytical thinking
• Dependable
• Problem solving
• Adaptable
• Strategic thinking

LANGUAGES
Dutch ⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫
English ⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫
German ⚫⚫⚫⚪⚪

EDUCATION
Post-graduate Course (Post HBO) Quality Engineering
(Alternative Black Belt)
NHL Stenden University of Applied Sciences, Emmen
2004 – 2005
Diploma obtained

Bachelor of Engineering Electronics
Hanze University of Applied Sciences, Groningen
1999 – 2003
Diploma obtained

INTERESTS
Repairing and restoring antique watches, designing and fabricating leather watch straps, high end audio and music, reading (science-fiction and science related), physical exercise, tennis

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

profile_positions.description:
Director with over 20 years of experience in (supplier) quality and development.

- Responsible for the BU's Grooming & Beauty and (partly) Mother & Childcare and Oral Healtcare
- Member of leadership teams: Corporate Supplier Quality Leadership Counsel (SQLT), Personal Health Quality leadership team (Q&R LT)
- Managing large global supply base with a spend >500 million annually
-  Responsible for supplier selection, qualification and release as well as supplier performance and compliance
- Responsible for supplier development and process maturity & control
- Products in scope ranging from high volume consumer goods to food contact and medical products in a broad spectrum of technologies & supplier types.
- Experienced People leader leading a global team of 37 (senior) professionals in multicultural teams in 6 countries across the globe

Some achievements:
- Successfully developed, deployed and executed a supplier quality strategy leading to a 70% reduction of supplier caused issues and resulting in a supplier world class performance of <20 PPM component failure and less than 0.2% of supplier caused return rate.
- Strategized, developed and deployed a corporate wide Supplier Introduced Change Request (SICR) process. This included supplier communication, corporate roll-out, embedding in corporate QMS and hyper care team.
- Developed and deployed Advanced Quality Product Planning (APQP) process for BU G&B. This included procedures, embedding in QMS, providing trainings and continual improvement on the process.
profile_positions.title: Director of Supplier Quality Engineering Personal Health BG Grooming & Beauty

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities Summary
- Responsible for managing the Industrialization of projects and the Quality performance and improvement of Strategic and/or Key Suppliers
- APQP process owner
- (Lead) Auditor role for Process, Quality and Sustainability audits at Suppliers
- Provide coaching to a team of Supplier Development Engineers
- Contribute to the Supplier Selection Process
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Supplier Development Engineering
